description: Try our easy to follow Baked Lemon Custards recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Baked Lemon Custards Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the custard into 4 individual ramekins and place on a baking sheet. Cook in a preheated oven, 120°C, Gas Mark 1/2, for 50 minutes or until the custards are almost set in the middle. Leave to stand until cold, then chill until required. Allow to return to room temperature before serving, decorated with the reserved bay leaves.

Leave to stand until cold, then chill until required. Allow to return to room temperature before serving, decorated with the reserved bay leaves.
